item.title: 日元下跌，美元全面走强，美联储确认将维持利率不变
item.description: 日元兑美元汇率创下本月最大单日跌幅，主要货币普遍遭遇抛售。美国经济数据支撑了美国国债收益率走高，并暗示美联储未来数月的降息步伐将放缓。【原文：The yen headed for its worst day this month amid a broader selloff in major currencies as US economic data supported higher Treasury yields and a shallower path of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts in the months ahead.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要显示多位官员对加息方案表示认同
item.description: 美联储官员再度对通胀表示担忧，"多位"政策制定者暗示，若通胀持续高于目标水平，央行可能需要加息。【原文：Federal Reserve officials signaled renewed worries over inflation with “several” policymakers suggesting the central bank may need to raise interest rates if inflation stays above their goal.】

item.title: 在智能手机环境中长大的千禧一代，如今却选择为子女购买基础款手机。
item.description:
千禧一代被屏幕烧坏了脑子。他们的孩子可不想沾上这点儿。【原文：

Los millennials se fundieron el cerebro con las pantallas. Sus hijos no quieren saber nada de eso.

】

item.title: 芝加哥拟从市政债券市场筹集4.76亿美元用于奥黑尔机场改造
item.description: 芝加哥奥黑尔国际机场正计划从市政债券市场借款约4.76亿美元，用于其耗资数十亿美元的全面改造工程。【原文：Chicago O’Hare International Airport is looking to borrow about $476 million from the municipal bond market as it undergoes a multi-billion dollar overhaul.】

item.title: 帕兰蒂尔意外迁至迈阿密共享办公空间
item.description: 帕兰提尔科技公司周二在社交媒体上发布简短声明，宣布将总部从丹佛迁至迈阿密，此举令众人大感意外。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. surprised everyone on Tuesday by announcing it had relocated its headquarters from Denver to Miami in a brief social media post.】

item.title: 普利兹克在联邦削减开支威胁下提出560亿美元预算案
item.description: 伊利诺伊州州长JB·普利兹克在该州面临成本上升及联邦资金不确定性加剧的背景下，为新财年提出约560亿美元的预算方案。【原文：Illinois Governor JB Pritzker proposed an approximately $56 billion budget for the coming year as the state faces higher costs and more uncertainty around federal funding under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 雀巢考虑减少对冰淇淋业务的投资
item.description: 知情人士透露，随着新任首席执行官菲利普·纳夫拉蒂尔对公司庞大业务进行审查，雀巢公司正考虑进一步缩减其在冰淇淋业务中的业务规模。【原文：Nestlé SA is considering further reducing its footprint in the ice cream business, as new Chief Executive Officer Philipp Navratil reviews the company’s sprawling operations, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 保乐力加考虑将其印度业务上市
item.description: 知情人士透露，生产绝对伏特加和芝华士威士忌的保乐力加公司正考虑将其印度业务上市。【原文：Pernod Ricard SA, the maker of Absolut vodka and Chivas Regal whisky, is considering a listing of its Indian business, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 科特迪瓦筹集13亿美元，非洲发行人积极发行欧洲债券
item.description: 周三，科特迪瓦通过发行13亿美元欧元债券为其预算筹资。非洲国家正利用较低的借贷成本和投资者风险偏好情绪的回升，积极开拓国际融资市场。【原文：Ivory Coast raised $1.3 billion in eurobonds on Wednesday to help finance its budget, as African nations exploit lower borrowing costs and risk-on investor sentiment to tap markets.】

item.title: 人工智能的页岩革命时刻
item.description: 资本支出热潮的终结【原文：Death of a capex boom.】

item.title: 欧洲央行委员施纳贝尔认为没有必要提前离任
item.description: 伊莎贝尔·施纳贝尔表示，她将致力于完成在欧洲央行执行委员会的任期。【原文：Isabel Schnabel said she’s committed to serving out her term on the European Central Bank’s Executive Board.】

item.title: 软件股以创纪录速度吸引散户逢低买盘，Citadel证券称
item.description: 随着华尔街疯狂重估受人工智能工具威胁的软件制造商股价，一批投资者正排队逢低买入。【原文：With Wall Street frantically repricing shares in software makers threatened by AI tools, one group of investors is lining up to buy the dip.】

item.title: 青少年实习生助力网件阻止诈骗者欺骗客户
item.description: 律师最终追踪到了诈骗资金的来源。【原文：Lawyers ultimately traced scammers’ money back to the source.】

item.title: 扎克伯格将在社交媒体成瘾诉讼中为Meta的青少年策略辩护
item.description: 马克·扎克伯格即将就社交媒体成瘾问题出庭作证，面临关于Meta平台公司如何在保护年轻用户与提升营收之间取得平衡的连番质询。【原文：Mark Zuckerberg is set to take the stand at a landmark trial over social media addiction and face a barrage of questions about how Meta Platforms Inc. balances protecting young users on its platforms and boosting revenue.】

item.title: 人工智能先驱李飞飞创立的World Labs公司完成10亿美元融资
item.description: 由人工智能先驱李飞飞创立的初创公司World Labs，在最新一轮融资中筹集了10亿美元资金，用于探索人工智能开发的新型方法。【原文：World Labs, a startup from artificial intelligence pioneer Fei-Fei Li, raised $1 billion in a new round of funding to pursue a novel approach to AI development.】

item.title: 苹果正式开启播客的代际变革
item.description: 苹果播客进军视频播客领域，使音频媒介重新聚焦于视觉呈现【原文：Apple Podcasts’ fresh leap into video podcasts refocuses the audio medium on visuals】

item.title: 人工智能遭遇挫折，欧洲将目光投向传统经济领域IPO寻求复苏
item.description: 欧洲首次公开募股市场期待已久的复苏，目前似乎将主要依赖国防和工业等传统领域，因为投资者正争相削减对人工智能相关领域的投资敞口。【原文：A long-awaited recovery in European initial public offerings appears set to hinge on traditional sectors like defense and industrials for now, as investors rush to cut their exposure to anything in the crosshairs of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 欧洲将如何选出拉加德的继任者担任欧洲央行行长
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德可能在任期结束前离职，以便在2027年法国总统大选可能出现极右翼胜选之前任命继任者。【原文：European Central Bank chief Christine Lagarde may leave her post before the end of her term, allowing a successor to be appointed before a potential far-right victory in French presidential elections in 2027.】

item.title: 奢侈品零售商Ssense创始人获收购批准，交易完成
item.description: 加拿大奢侈时尚零售商Ssense的创始人主导收购案获得法院批准，尽管部分贷款方试图阻止该交易，并推动启动清算程序以追回更多资金。【原文：A founder-led buyout of Canadian luxury fashion retailer Ssense obtained court approval, despite a group of lenders seeking to block the deal and pushing for a liquidation process to recover more money.】

item.title: 爱尔兰政府考虑禁止青少年使用社交媒体
item.description: 爱尔兰政府周三在内阁会议上审议了一项计划，拟在社交媒体平台实施年龄限制，作为更广泛人工智能战略的一部分。【原文：The Irish government is considering plans to introduce age restrictions on social media platforms as part of a broader AI strategy at a cabinet meeting Wednesday.】

item.title: 谷歌Gemini与苹果新增音乐专属生成式AI功能
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet和苹果公司正将专注于音乐的生成式人工智能功能整合到其核心消费级应用中，这凸显了先进人工智能工具正逐步进入主流应用领域。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google and Apple Inc. are adding music-focused generative artificial intelligence features to their core consumer apps, underscoring how advanced AI tools are moving into mainstream use.】

item.title: 拜耳斥资70亿美元终结农达诅咒的努力引发质疑
item.description: 拜耳集团首席执行官比尔·安德森为使公司摆脱与除草剂"农达"相关的多年法律纠纷所做的努力，正面临着投资者的质疑。【原文：Bayer AG Chief Executive Officer Bill Anderson’s effort to extricate the company from the years-long legal battles related to its Roundup pesticide is facing some skepticism from investors.】

item.title: 仲裁员支持加拿大航空在空乘人员纠纷中的立场
item.description: 加拿大航空被仲裁员裁定需在四年内为其15,000名客舱乘务员加薪逾20%，该方案基本符合公司最初的提议。【原文：Air Canada was ordered by an arbitrator to increase wages for its 15,000 cabin crew members by more than 20% over four years, largely in line with what the company initially proposed.】

item.title: 亿万富翁投资者德鲁肯米勒在1月行情前大举买入最大巴西ETF
item.description: 亿万富翁投资者斯坦利·德鲁肯米勒的投资公司在一月份巴西股市迎来强劲反弹前夕，大量买入追踪巴西股票的最大交易所交易基金。【原文：Billionaire investor Stanley Druckenmiller’s investment firm amassed a position in the largest exchange-traded fund tracking Brazilian stocks just before a sharp rally swept through that market in January.】

item.title: Brightline获得通勤债券付款两个月宽限期
item.description: 债券持有人同意给予Brightline公司约两个月的"宽限期"，该公司运营着一条连接迈阿密与奥兰多、全长235英里的私营铁路，其通勤债券的利息支付原定于2月17日到期。【原文：Bondholders granted Brightline, which runs a 235-mile private railroad between Miami and Orlando, a roughly two-month “grace period” on an interest payment due on its commuter bonds on Feb. 17.】

item.title: IPO市场在72亿美元融资潮后步履蹒跚地进入季节性低迷期
item.description: 备受期待的IPO热潮可能需要更长时间才能显现，因为新股发行市场步入季节性清淡期。【原文：The highly-anticipated IPO boom may take a little longer to materialize as the market for new issuances limped into a seasonal quiet period.】

item.title: 谷歌抢先发布499美元Pixel 10a，iPhone 17e发布在即
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet旗下品牌近日推出新款入门级Pixel智能手机，希望通过新增的人工智能软件功能、硬件细节优化以及维持499美元的定价策略，弥补此次迭代更新中缺乏突破性改进的不足。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google introduced its latest entry-level Pixel smartphone, hoping that new AI software capabilities, minor hardware refinements and an unchanged $499 price can make up for an otherwise iterative update.】

item.title: 量子初创企业Pasqal以独角兽估值寻求2亿欧元融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，法国量子初创企业Pasqal SAS正筹备一轮融资，拟筹集2亿欧元（约合2.37亿美元），此轮融资将使该公司估值突破10亿美元。【原文：French quantum startup Pasqal SAS is in talks to raise €200 million ($237 million) in a round that would value it at more than $1 billion pre-money, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 标普500指数在经历人工智能板块谨慎情绪后攀升，交易员寻求赢家
item.description: 周三美国股市小幅走高，投资者纷纷追捧遭抛售的个股。此前因担忧人工智能可能对多个行业造成冲击，市场经历了一段震荡行情。【原文：US equities edged higher on Wednesday as investors hunted for beaten-down stocks following a stretch of choppy trading driven by concern about the potential disruption that artificial intelligence poses to a bevy of sectors.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦无法摆脱中国石油管道依赖，1月数据显示
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦1月份仅能将少量无法通过中哈管道运输的原油转运至黑海，导致该国原油产量大幅下滑。【原文：Kazakhstan was able to divert only a small fraction of the crude it could not ship through the CPC pipeline to the Black Sea in January, contributing to a sharp drop in production.】
